question: Your local newspaper is offering an award for people who have helped the community. Write a letter to the newspaper editor. In your letter • suggest someone you think should receive the award • describe what the person does to help the community • suggest an award that would be appropriate for this person
text: I am writing this letter to share my idea about your recent offer which asked the public to introduce a helpful citizen in our city.

Firstly, due to recent occurrences and the corona pandemic, I think, all staff of the care system doing unforgettable services to folk.Therefore I believe, Ms Ahmadi who is working in the central hospital is a good option to receive this award.

Actually, she does significant services to our community. For example, she spends more time in the hospital and has longer hours to treat sick people.  Even I know she helps the elderly to order their needs.

I know your newspaper is very popular in our area so, they have a lot of impact on our authorities. I have the expectation, ask hospital officials to give her a promotion and also you can make a statue of her and install it in the centre square.
Thank you for taking your time and your consideration of my letter. I looking forward to hearing your result.
